q: Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so," David Cameron said in an e-mailed statement. Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government. " Looking for a spark, 76ers coach Eddie Jordan benched power forward Elton Brand and paired rookie Jrue Holiday in the backcourt with Allen Iverson . Jordan's move worked: Jrue Holiday had 15 points, seven rebounds and six assists. He just put us in a good rhythm tonight and had us flowing, Allen Iverson said. Elton Brand , who was previously benched in some fourth quarters, said it was hard to complain about his role after a victory. So David Letterman reaches down from behind the desk and produces a bottle of Grey Goose, to which Betty White laughs heartily. They share some vodka, then she does a classic spit-take. CAW President Ken Lewenza said Monday that the employees appreciate the recognition.. I think it's a vote of confidence for the direction of Chrysler corporation and obviously Sergio Marchionne appreciates the kind of work ethic that has been developing in the plants in terms of changing its culture, said Lewenza. CAW Local 444 President Rick Laporte reiterated there is no question the workers have helped put the company on the right track, but he was a little concerned about the bonus idea.
